info.title: EDIS Global Management API
info.description:
Use the API to access and manage your VPS services, including power control, rDNS, and VNC management.  
**Authentication:** Enable API access on any KVM VPS you own. Then use the provided credentials to authenticate your requests.

servers.description: SwaggerHub API Auto Mocking
Production Server
Sandbox Server
Session Authentication Server

post.description: Use this endpoint to create an authentication session for managing your KVM VPS. Simply provide your WHMCS credentials (`email` and `password`) to authenticate requests. Optionally, you can specify a `kvm_id` to limit the session access to a specific KVM instance

requestBody.description: Required credentials to authenticate and create a session. Optionally, you can include `kvm_id` to target a specific KVM.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid credentials or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid WHMCS credentials.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Session Authentication Server

post.description:
This endpoint performs a hard reset on the specified KVM VPS. 
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL. 
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters from 
the same response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to execute the hard reset.

200.description: The KVM VPS was successfully reset.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Power Management Server - Replace `api_host` with the value returned 
from the "Create AUTH-session" response.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the power state of the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Use the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters returned from the 
"Create AUTH-session" response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to retrieve the power state.

200.description: The power state of the KVM VPS was retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Power Management Server - Replace `api_host` with the value returned 
from the "Create AUTH-session" response.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint powers on the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` obtained from the 
"Create AUTH-session" response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to power on the VPS.

200.description: The KVM VPS was successfully powered on.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Power Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint powers off the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters from the 
"Create AUTH-session" response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to power off the VPS.

200.description: The KVM VPS was successfully powered off.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Power Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of available ISO files that can be used for installation on the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters from the 
"Create AUTH-session" response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to retrieve the ISO list.

200.description: A list of available ISO files retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of available turnkey images for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters from the 
"Create AUTH-session" response to authenticate the request.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve the list of turnkey images.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: A list of available turnkey images retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each server and must be dynamically set.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint reinstalls the operating system on the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and other required parameters 
to execute the reinstallation.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to reinstall the operating system.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: The operating system was successfully reinstalled on the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each session.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint reinstalls the operating system on the specified KVM VPS using a turnkey image.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and `image` parameters to execute the reinstallation.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to reinstall the operating system using a turnkey image.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: The operating system was successfully reinstalled using the specified turnkey image.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint mounts an ISO file to the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and `iso` parameters.  
Optionally, you can include `force_reset` to reset the VPS and boot from the mounted ISO.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to mount an ISO to the VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: The ISO was successfully mounted to the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each session.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint unmounts the currently mounted ISO file from the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to execute the unmount operation.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to unmount an ISO from the VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: The ISO was successfully unmounted from the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each session.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint downloads a custom ISO from a provided URL and adds it to the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and the `url` of the ISO to be downloaded.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to download a custom ISO and add it to the VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: The custom ISO was successfully downloaded and added to the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each session.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint uploads and replaces the current qcow2 image on the specified KVM VPS.  
**Warning:** All data on the VPS will be permanently lost if this operation is performed.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and confirm data replacement by including `yes_purge_all_my_data` parameter.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to upload and replace the qcow2 image.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded` or as file upload where specified.

200.description: The qcow2 image was successfully uploaded and replaced on the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
This URL is unique for each session.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a list of available autoinstall images for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to fetch the available images.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve the list of autoinstall images.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: A list of available autoinstall images retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Installation Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response, 
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint handles multiple configurations for a specified KVM VPS.  
Use the `operation` parameter to specify the desired action:  
- **enable_auto_hydration:** Enable auto hydration with `{"auto_hydration":100}`.  
- **disable_auto_hydration:** Disable auto hydration with `{"auto_hydration":0}`.  
- **update_settings:** Update general system settings with a JSON configuration.

requestBody.description: Required parameters for KVM VPS configuration.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - Access is not allowed.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Settings Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the current configuration settings for the specified KVM VPS.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to fetch the configuration.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to fetch the configuration for a VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - Access is not allowed.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Settings Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a current screenshot of the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to retrieve the screenshot.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to fetch a screenshot for the VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Screenshot Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
dynamically replaces `xxxxx` in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host value obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves comprehensive details about the specified KVM VPS,  
including configuration, resource usage, network settings, and metadata.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to fetch the information.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to fetch all details for a KVM VPS.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Details Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
dynamically replaces `xxxxx` in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host value obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves network traffic usage details for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to access traffic data.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to fetch traffic data for a KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Traffic Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

This endpoint retrieves the CPU usage statistics for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to access CPU usage data.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to fetch CPU usage statistics for a KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

is dynamically set in the URL.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves a few basic details about the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to access the VPS details.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to fetch basic details about the KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: Basic details about the KVM VPS retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Details Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the mount details for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters obtained  
from the same response to access the mount details.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to fetch mount details for a KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
Mount Details Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint configures the keyboard language for the VNC session of a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Supported keyboard languages include `en-us`, `de`, `sv`, `fr`, and `it`.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and `vnc_keyboard` parameters obtained  
from the "Create AUTH-session" call to configure the keyboard language.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to configure the VNC keyboard language.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or missing fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description:
VNC Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the current status of the VNC session for a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to get the VNC session status.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve the VNC session status.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters in the request.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session signature provided.

403.description: Forbidden - Access to the requested resource is denied.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected issue occurred on the server.

servers.description:
VNC Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint enables VNC access for a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and `vnc_pw` parameters to activate VNC.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to enable VNC access.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - The request contains invalid parameters or required fields are missing.

401.description: Unauthorized - The provided session signature is invalid or has expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have the required permissions to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server side.

servers.description:
VNC Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint disables VNC access for a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to disable VNC access.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to disable VNC access.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - The request contains invalid parameters or missing required fields.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature provided is invalid or has expired.

403.description: Forbidden - The client does not have the required permissions to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server side.

servers.description:
VNC Management Server - The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the PTR (Reverse DNS) records for specified IP addresses.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, `api_host`, and a JSON-encoded list of IP addresses to query their PTR records.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to retrieve PTR records.

400.description: Bad Request - The request contains missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - The provided session signature is invalid or has expired.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server.

servers.description: Reverse DNS API Server

post.description:
This endpoint deletes PTR (Reverse DNS) records for specified IP addresses.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and a JSON-encoded list of IP addresses to delete their PTR records.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to delete PTR records.

400.description: Bad Request - The request is missing required parameters or contains invalid values.

401.description: Unauthorized - The session signature provided is invalid or has expired.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred on the server.

servers.description: Reverse DNS API Server

post.description:
This endpoint sets PTR (Reverse DNS) records for specified IP addresses.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and a JSON-encoded object of IP addresses and their associated hostnames to set PTR records.

requestBody.description: Required parameters to set PTR records.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Reverse DNS API Server

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves all webhooks configured for the specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, and `valid_until` parameters to fetch the list of webhooks.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve all webhooks for a KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - You do not have permission to access this resource.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Webhooks API Server

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the total size of the global traffic pool for a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve the global traffic pool size.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

200.description: Global traffic pool size retrieved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Traffic Pool API Server - Replace `{api_host}` with the `api_host` value obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint retrieves the hydration (refill) log for a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Use the `query` parameter to filter the log by `client` or `kvm`.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to retrieve the hydration log.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Traffic Pool API Server - Replace `{api_host}` with the `api_host` value obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.summary: Assign Traffic Resources from Global Pool
post.description:
This endpoint assigns additional traffic resources from the global pool to a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
The amount of traffic to assign is specified in the `traffic` parameter (in GB).

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to assign traffic resources.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Traffic Pool API Server - Replace `{api_host}` with the `api_host` value obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint deletes a specific webhook for a given KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and `id` of the webhook to delete.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to delete a webhook for a KVM VPS.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid or missing parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - Access denied.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Webhooks API Server

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint allows setting up webhooks for traffic monitoring on a specified KVM VPS.  
The `api_host` parameter, obtained from the **"Create AUTH-session"** response,  
is dynamically set in the URL.  
Provide the `signature`, `kvm_id`, `valid_until`, and webhook configuration details.

requestBody.description:
Required parameters to set a webhook for traffic monitoring.  
All parameters must be passed in the request body as `application/x-www-form-urlencoded`.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired session.

403.description: Forbidden - Permission denied.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Webhooks API Server

api_host.description: The API host obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" response.

post.description:
This endpoint demonstrates the structure of a callback triggered when a specified traffic threshold is reached.  
The callback URL should be provided during webhook setup, and this request will be made when the traffic trigger value is reached.

requestBody.description: Parameters sent to the callback URL when the webhook is triggered.

400.description: Bad Request - Missing or invalid parameters.

500.description: Internal Server Error - An unexpected error occurred.

servers.description: Callback Server - The `callback_url` parameter should be provided when setting up the webhook.

callback_url.description: The user-defined callback URL where webhook notifications are sent.

signature.description: The session signature obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" call.

kvm_id.description:
The unique identifier of the KVM VPS whose configuration is being retrieved.  
This value is specific to your VPS.

valid_until.description:
The expiration timestamp for the session, as obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" call.  
Ensure that the session is valid and has not expired.

status.description: Indicates the operation failed due to an unauthorized request.
Indicates the status of the request.
Indicates the status of the request.

error_code.description: A code representing the authentication error.

message.example: Invalid session signature. Please log in again.

error.description: Explanation for the unauthorized access attempt.

error.example: Unauthorized: Session signature is invalid or expired

msg.description: Message indicating the status of the traffic pool.

available_pool_traffic.description: The available traffic pool size in GB.

assigned_traffic.description: The amount of traffic assigned (in GB).

signature.description: The session signature obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" call.

kvm_id.description:
The unique identifier of the KVM VPS to reinstall.  
This value is specific to your VPS.

valid_until.description:
The expiration timestamp for the session, as obtained from the "Create AUTH-session" call.  
Ensure that the session is valid and has not expired.

image.description:
The name of the operating system image to install.  
Use the `get autoinstall images` endpoint to retrieve available images.

password.description: The root password for the new installation.

pubkey.description:
(Deprecated) An optional SSH public key to configure for root access.  
Use cloud-init user data for advanced configurations.

postscript.description:
(Deprecated) An Optional script to execute after the installation completes.  
Use this for post-installation tasks.

cloudinit_user_data.description:
Optional configuration for images supporting cloud-init.  
Refer to the [Cloud-init documentation](https://cloudinit.readthedocs.io/en/latest/reference/examples.html) for details.
cloudinit_user_data.example:
#cloud-config
set_hostname: YOUR_HOSTNAME
user: root
password: YOUR_ROOT_PASSWORD
ssh_pwauth: True
manage_etc_hosts: true

trigger_value.description:
Trigger value to activate the webhook.

- Set to `demo` for immediate unique call.

when the trigger value is reached.  
Example: `https://example.com/yourcallback`.  
Source IP: `149.154.154.251`
